messages.content: Jarvis is an advanced AI assistant built with Next.js and powered by OpenRouter LLMs. It features a RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) system using Pinecone for vector storage, allowing you to chat with your uploaded documents.

For cost-effective usage, I recommend: 1) Use google/gemini-flash-1.5 or meta-llama/llama-3.1-8b-instruct models, 2) Set MAX_TOKENS to 256 and TEMPERATURE to 0.3, 3) Enable caching to reduce Pinecone API calls, and 4) Monitor the cost estimates provided with each response.

Jarvis offers: Voice chat with Web Speech API, document upload and RAG querying, command palette for quick actions, dashboard with weather/news/notes, conversation summaries with PDF export, knowledge space for document management, and full dark mode support with beautiful animations.

summary: User learned about Jarvis AI assistant, including its core features, cost optimization strategies, and available functionality.
